detailsData.title: 40+ Years Experience
detailsData.content: With over 40 years of legal experience, our firm has built a reputation for achieving excellent results for clients with unmatched personalized service.

detailsData.title: Millions Recovered
detailsData.content: Our skilled and battle-tested personal injury lawyers have helped injured people and families of people killed by others for decades, recovering millions of dollars.

detailsData.title: Tailored Representation
detailsData.content: Unlike most injury law firms, we provide individually tailored counsel and representation to every client we take, ensuring personalized and dedicated legal service.

detailsData.title: Legal Honors
detailsData.content: Our attorneys are not just experienced; they are also recognized with dozens of legal honors, showcasing their expertise and respect in the legal community.

address: 333 W. Santa Clara Street Suite 620, San Jose, CA 95113
subHeading: Wrongful Death & Serious Injury Lawyers in San Jose
valueProp: A catastrophic event has the potential to change a person's life, sometimes forever, particularly in cases of wrongful death. If you were injured by someone else's negligence or recklessness, protect your rights and get the legal help you deserve from an experienced San Jose personal injury lawyer. The San Jose personal injury lawyers at Golden State Lawyers, APC have built their reputation by achieving excellent results for clients with unmatched personalized service. For over 40 years, our Injury and Death Attorneys in San Jose, California have focused on representing people who suffer injury or damage due to the fault of others.

testimonalData.text: Cannot say enough positive things about my experience with Golden Gate Lawyers. I was involved in an auto wreck with injuries, and their steady guidance through the process enabled us to navigate smoothly through to resolution with the other parties.
testimonalData.author: Mark F.

testimonalData.text: As a victim of a crime I needed to find an attorney. We were referred to Robert Bohn from our friend who was a retired police officer. I found him to be a perfect fit for my circumstances.
testimonalData.author: Darnell C.

testimonalData.text: I cannot thank Golden Gate Lawyers enough. I came to them with a very difficult case. It was an injury from years ago that had continued to get worse & as the medical bills came in my stress level increased.
testimonalData.author: Bridget H.
